Our purpose

To create the extraordinary

We exist to entertain. The stories we tell enthral, empower and engage our audiences every day, connecting with their souls and their complex yet intriguing world. In everything we do, we dare to not only be better than before, but also bigger and bolder. Because we aspire to be extraordinary, not as a goal, but as the standard. Because the extra mile is where the magic happens.

Read more

Our tech capabilities

On the cutting edge of innovation

Entertaining consumers 24x7 in varied languages through different platforms across innumerable geographies is no mean feat. But our state-of-the-art technology sure does make it look like it is. Complementing them is our highly talented team of programming specialists and world-class content production and distribution infrastructure.

Read more
